ygData.subject: Re: Guk expedition , part II
ygData.msgSnippet: Talking bout GUK, would anybody be interested to do Najena too if this expedition goes well? ) Damask armor and stuff comes off the magicians and from what I
ygData.messageBody:
Talking bout GUK, would anybody be interested to do Najena too if this
expedition goes well? ) Damask armor and stuff comes off the magicians and
from what I saw they are about level 14-15. Good for xp and good loot hehe

>>From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
>>
>>Thx u Serp and Lesh for the feedback.
>>
>>LOL, Im more Greedy than Crazy.. hmmmm i think both..A crazy greedy monk.
>>
>>Let's hit Guk than.
>>
>>There's my proposal. Please let me have your ideas and most imporatnt of
>>all, WHEN and how long u can play and stay B4 log-out.
>>
>>1) We Meet at Oasis, 1st Pillar make our way to Innoulthe Swamp on Friday
>>evening 9:00 PM.
>>2) Look around and hunt a bit if still got time
>>3) Saturday Morning: 9:00AM , go GUK and Kick ass!.
>>
>>Your ideas and suggestion pls, some of u have the experiment at Guk and
>>swamp, pls share.
>>
>>So far, the following ppl r interested, except timing not confirm.
>>1) Leshrec-Wiz
>>2) Garren- Pal
>>3) Trifrost-Shaman
>>4) Ziltus-Wiz
>>5) Yiyang-Monk
>>
>>Let's confirm this b4 Friday evening tommorrow. if last min, some of u
cant
>>make it (overtime etc) ,np. we will see how and decide if we can still
>>continue, BUT the expedition is ON .
>>
>>Yiyang'ing to Guk
>>
>>

>is

quite

>>>>From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
>>>>
>>>>I have been postponing the trip to Guk for the foloowing selfish reasons
>>:P
>>>>
>>>>1) The lower guk has very mean monsters(2oth-30th lvl) that carries nice
>>>>stuff: There my shopping list:
>>>>a)collar of undead protection, 5hp,7 vs disease and poison,
>>>>b)The Jorneyman boots-slightly slower than SOW, just click on it and
>>>>run.-Very nice
>>>>c) Silverplate plate bracers-+ 7hp (upperguk)
>>>>d) Azure sleeves +12hp weight only 0.4 (lower guk)
>>>>e) Kobold boots
>>>>f) mesh , mesh mesh
>>>>and the animated Hand that gives out ????
>>>>
>>>>2) My lvl is only 17th , cant hit the lower guk yet. I can hit the upper
>>>guk
>>>>Gaz, taz warriors for the mesh but the next time i go back to lower guk,
>>my
>>>>factions with them is so bad that any frogglock and Kolbold that will
KOS
>>>me
>>>>onsight. I hope to hit 20+ lvl go striagth into lower guk and storm the
>>>>buggers.
>>>>
>>>>3) Is so difficult to gather a group at the FIX day and time to hunt
for
>>>at
>>>>least 3-4 hrs, camp there and go back in again at a later time-Together
>>and
>>>>so on. It IS very important to be in Group.
>>>>
>>>>There my suggested list of personal in the Guk group
>>>>a) at least 1 monk
>>>>b) at least 1 Paladin
>>>>c) 1 Shaman
>>>>d) 1 Wiz
>>>>c) 1 rogue
>>>>d) anyone/any char
>>>>
>>>>Monk and paladin to tank, shaman to hit and buff, wiz to ROOT and
>>hit -this
>>>>4 char r the mininum for a group. Xp is NOt the purpose. It the Goodies
>we
>>>>all want. i say if u r below lvl 10th also can come for the adventure,
>>>thats
>>>>if u dont mind the xp.
>>>>Garren is now 18th Pal
>>>>Leshrec is 17th Wiz, can made 18th by weekend, np
>>>>Yiyang 17th Monk, may nit make 18th by weekend- got problem :P
>>>>Trifrost 14th Shaman, can make 15th by weekend, np
>>>>
>>>>Some of u are experience in Guk eg, Garren ,Sereph and Leshrec, etc ,
>your
>>>>comments pls.
>>>>
>>>>Please add and correct on the above. Im open for the Expedition to Guk.
>>>>Today is Thursday. Wanna meets on Saturday mornning?? I hve to log at
>>>>1:00pm and be back at 8:pm. suggestion please.
>>>>
>>>>Yiyang of Innoruuk
